summary.span: 命名空間支援應用程式使用擴充保護進行驗證。

span.span: The namespace provides support for authentication using extended protection for applications.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 設計的整合式 Windows 驗證 (IWA) 可讓某些認證的挑戰回應成為通用，這表示可以重複使用或轉寄。The design of Integrated Windows Authentication (IWA) allows for some credential challenge responses to be universal, meaning they can be re-used or forwarded. 如果不需要此特定設計功能，則所面臨的挑戰回應應該建構，最小值、 目標特定資訊然後，在最佳情況下也某些通道特定資訊。If this particular design feature is not needed then the challenge responses should be constructed with, at minimum, target specific information and, at best, also some channel specific information. 服務隨後可以提供擴充的保護，以確保認證的挑戰回應包含服務特定資訊 （服務提供者名稱或 SPN） 和，必要時，通道特定資訊 （通道繫結權杖或 CBT）。Services can then provide extended protection to ensure that credential challenge responses contain service specific information (a Service Provider Name or SPN) and, if necessary, channel specific information (a channel binding token or CBT). 利用此資訊在認證交換中，服務就能進一步免於惡意使用可能未正確取得的認證挑戰回應的。With this information in the credential exchanges, services are able to better protect against malicious use of credential challenge responses that might have been improperly obtained.
